snippet: The F.B.I. and the University of Mississippi are looking for two men who left a noose and flag with a Confederate battle emblem on a statue of the university’s first black student.
abstract: Federal Bureau of Investigation says it has joined the inquiry into an act of vandalism at the University of Mississippi, where a statue of the university’s first black student was found with a noose and a flag with the Confederate battle emblem.
lead_paragraph: The F.B.I. and the University of Mississippi are looking for two men who left a noose and flag with a Confederate battle emblem on a statue of the university’s first black student.

headline.main: F.B.I. Joins Ole Miss Inquiry After Noose Is Left on Statue
headline.print_headline: F.B.I. Joins Ole Miss Inquiry After Noose Is Left on Statue
